Tom Emerson wrote:

> ....
>
>
>With that said, I have a little utility that uses my libarc library to
>extract the text/html documents from a set of ARC files into a
>directory structure where 1000 files are written in consecutively
>numbered directories, and the file names are similarly synthesized
>from a prefix and number. If people are interested I can make this
>available.
>
>  
>
Put it up someplace Tom.  I'll add a pointer from the FAQ.
Thanks,
